entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle changing to a few flurries or drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
